home.welcome: Welcome to Murder Mystery Event Scheduler
home.description: Plan and organize thrilling murder mystery events with friends!

features.scheduleEventsDesc: Create and manage exciting murder mystery events.
features.inviteFriendsDesc: Easily invite and manage participants for your events.
features.exploreScenariosDesc: Choose from a variety of intriguing murder mystery scenarios.

login.title: Sign In to Murder Mystery Scheduler
login.description: Use your Google account to sign in and start planning your murder mystery events!
